message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a convolutional neural network (CNN) for image question answering (QA), which involves learning representations of both images and questions and their interactions. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and information retrieval (cs.IR). Among these, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely categories, as they directly relate to the image and language aspects of the problem, respectively. However, the paper also involves classification and learning, which are relevant to cs.AI and cs.LG. Finally, the use of multimodal representations and joint learning could be relevant to cs.IR, which deals with information retrieval from multiple sources.
